channel.title: Unusal Request
channel.description:
Well i have a bro who can't really type fast and it takes him ages to do this... You know in like age of empires how you type something in the cheat box and it gives you 1000 wood or something? I need a script that could do that...
Press enter type: forcecarbon Press enter... Repeat that for about 20 times Then press enter again Type: forcefood Repeat So on and so forth Type: forcenova
enter repeat Type: forceore enter end
Thanks if anyone wants to try it!

item.title: Unusal Request
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

If you want to choose it yourself, either way change this part in every procedure: until(s = 21); Into the times you want to repeat it, or add a constant: Con times= the amount of times, and change this part in every procedure: until(s = 21); to this: until(s = times);

Add an IsFKeyDown part, so when 'the scar noob’s bro, let him press a key for it to type.
Like, F2 will type the food code, F3 will type the wood code and so on…

Read full topic

item.title: Unusal Request
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Here is a script. I dont know if it works because I have no idea on how to select the client if its a fullscreen game. But here it is:

program New;
var s, d, f, g : integer;

procedure forcecarbon;
begin
repeat
sendkeys('forcecarbon' + chr(13));
wait(500);
s := s + 1;
until(s = 21);
end;

procedure forcefood;
begin
repeat
sendkeys('forcefood' + chr(13));
wait(500);
d := d + 1;
until(d = 21);
end;

procedure forcenova;
begin
repeat
sendkeys('forcenova' + chr(13));
wait(500);
f := f + 1;
until(f = 21);
end;

procedure forceore;
begin
repeat
sendkeys('forceore' + chr(13));
wait(500);
g := g + 1;
until(g = 21);
end;

begin
activateclient;
forcecarbon;
forcefood;
forcenova;
forceore;
end.

Read full topic
